Quit bitching about download speed. 

When you have 3 times as many seeders as leechers, as is common when a new, more anticipated release comes out, you are going to have fewer connected peers and lower speeds than you normally would. 

Please learn a little bit about how peer file sharing works before you post these stupid, whiney complaints about the download being slow.
